fr.univ_lille1.fil.coo.plugins.finder

Class PluginFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • fr.univ_lille1.fil.coo.plugins.finder.PluginFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PluginFinder
extends java.util.TimerTask
    This class is used to set the directory where to find Plugins
